column2: Grant an Estate to this character. This will give them a monthly revenue and make them more loyal to you.
Grant an Estate to this character. This will give them a monthly revenue and make them more loyal to you.
Consider the size of the Estate that will be granted to §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! (you will also have the opportunity to reconsider, if you wish).\n
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants an Estate to provide for [This.GetHerHim]self and [This.GetHerHis] family.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is not happy with the size of [This.GetHerHis] Estate.

I have arranged for the sale of my old Estate so that I can concentrate my wealth in the businesses that I now hold.
Today, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] asked me for an Estate to prosper from...
I told [From.GetHerHim] I could not afford it...
I have decided to grant an Estate to [From.GetFullName], but how much will [From.GetSheHe] receive?
This character has been granted a minor estate to live on.
